Mobility & Devices

Z5X Technology and Innovation Center is an innovative technology solutions firm with capabilities in strategy, consulting, digital, technology and operations. We thrive on the hard problems that exist in the intersection of Business, Technology and Experience.

Mobility Services IOT Smart TV AR,VR Wearables

Mobility continues to be one of the most disruptive technologies in its impact and reach. Enterprises are constantly challenged to keep pace with accelerated proliferation of devices with multiple form factors on different platforms. Enterprises are ﬁnding it difficult to maximize the potential of mobility opportunities for consumer engagement, workplace solutions and partner engagement.

Strategy & Consulting

Enterprise mobility strategy, mobility architecture, enterprise mobility user experience design.

Implementation

Enterprise mobile application, Development, Enterprise mobile application testing, Enterprise mobility application migration.

Technical Services

Mobile application life cycle management, Mobile device management data and serve integration.

Accelerators & Frameworks

Browser, Customer, Engagement and Loyalty platform, Mobile retail solution suite.

How We Can Do

At Z5X, we enable you to explore the tangible benefits of these emerging technologies. By collaborating with you, we can create and immersive and visually delightful experiences to your customers. Throughout your AR and VR journey, we work to understand your challenges, define the problem, ideate solutions, build storyboards and perform tests accordingly

Our developers are experts in building AR and VR environments and frameworks. They leverage platforms including Unity, ARCore, ARKit, Vuforia, Wikitude to design, develop and deploy unique and engaging AR and VR applications that drive digital growth. What’s more, our in-house innovation lab leverages global best practices, methodology and design thinking. This allows us to provide ideas, develop through rapid validation and deliver a minimum viable product quickly and cost-effectively. If this sounds good to you, it would be great to talk to us.

With the wider use of wearable technology, enterprises see wearable computing as one of the biggest opportunity to drive efficiency and improve communication and workflow.
